Package menus

package menus
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    menus.applicantFilter
     
    menus.enquiry

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ExitMenu
    The ExitMenu class provides a menu option to exit the application.
    GetDate
    The GetDate class provides a utility method for prompting the user to input a date.
    HomeMenu
    The HomeMenu class redirects users to their respective menus based on their user type.
    IdMenu
    The abstract IdMenu class provides a template for menus that require an ID to function, such as displaying a single project's details or performing operations on a specific item identified by an ID.
    LoginMenu
    The LoginMenu class provides a menu interface for users to log in to the application.
    LogoutMenu
    The LogoutMenu class provides a menu interface for users to log out of the application.
    Menu
    The abstract Menu class provides a template for different menu types in the system.
    PasswordChangeMenu
    The PasswordChangeMenu class provides a menu interface for users to change their password.
